001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.controlStream;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.controlStream.NonexistentPumpingStateStreamRequest;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.historyLog.BolusDeliveryHistoryLog;
011
012import java.util.HashSet;
013import java.util.Set;
014import java.util.TreeSet;

016/**
017 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.controlStream.NonexistentPumpingStateStreamRequest}, opCode -23, size 5
018 *
019 * <br>
020 *
021 * 
022 * <table border='1'>
023 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>-23</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>5</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
027 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>characteristic</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.bluetooth.Characteristic#CONTROL_STREAM}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
028 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.controlStream.NonexistentPumpingStateStreamRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
029 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>stream</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
030 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>signed</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
031 * </table>
032 */
033@MessageProps(
034    opCode=-23,
035    size=5, // 29 with 24 byte padding
036    type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
037    characteristic=Characteristic.CONTROL_STREAM,
038    request=NonexistentPumpingStateStreamRequest.class,
039    stream=true,
040    signed=true
041)
042public class PumpingStateStreamResponse extends Message {
043    
044    private boolean isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp;
045    private long stateBitmask;
046    
047    public PumpingStateStreamResponse() {}
048    
049    public PumpingStateStreamResponse(boolean isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp, long stateBitmask) {
050        this.cargo = buildCargo(isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp, stateBitmask);
051        this.isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp = isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp;
052        this.stateBitmask = stateBitmask;
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * <table border="1">
057     * <caption>Parsed fields for PumpingStateStreamResponse:</caption>
058     * <tr><td><code>isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp</code></td><td><code>raw[0] != 0</code></td></tr>
059     * <tr><td><code>stateBitmask</code></td><td><code>Bytes.readUint32(raw, 1)</code></td></tr>
060     * </table>
061     */
062    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
063        raw = removeSignedRequestHmacBytes(raw);
064        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size());
065        this.cargo = raw;
066        this.isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp = raw[0] != 0;
067        this.stateBitmask = Bytes.readUint32(raw, 1);
068    }
069
070    
071    /**
072     * <table border="1">
073     * <caption>Byte layout for PumpingStateStreamResponse.buildCargo(...):</caption>
074     * <tr><th>Offset</th><th>Description</th></tr>
075     * <tr><td>0</td><td><code>(byte) (isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp ? 1 : 0)</code></td></tr>
076     * <tr><td>1</td><td><code>toUint32(stateBitmask) [byte 0]</code></td></tr>
077     * <tr><td>2</td><td><code>toUint32(stateBitmask) [byte 1]</code></td></tr>
078     * <tr><td>3</td><td><code>toUint32(stateBitmask) [byte 2]</code></td></tr>
079     * <tr><td>4</td><td><code>toUint32(stateBitmask) [byte 3]</code></td></tr>
080     * </table>
081     */
082    public static byte[] buildCargo(boolean isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp, long stateBitmask) {
083        return Bytes.combine(
084            new byte[]{ (byte) (isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp ? 1 : 0) }, 
085            Bytes.toUint32(stateBitmask));
086    }
087    
088    public boolean getIsPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp() {
089        return isPumpingStateSetAfterStartUp;
090    }
091    public long getStateBitmask() {
092        return stateBitmask;
093    }
094    public Set<PumpingState> getStates() {
095        return PumpingState.fromBitmask(stateBitmask);
096    }
097
098    public enum PumpingState {
099        IS_DELIVERING_THERAPY(1),
100        CAN_RESUME_THERAPY(2),
101        CAN_AUTO_RESUME(4),
102        BOLUS_ALLOWED(8),
103        TUBING_FILLED(16),
104        DELIVERING_BASAL(32),
105        DELIVERING_BOLUS(64),
106        DELIVERING_NORMAL_BOLUS(128),
107        IS_FILL_TUBING_ALLOWED(256),
108        IS_BASAL_STATE(512),
109        IS_PREP_CARTRIDGE_STATE(1024),
110        IS_LOAD_CARTRIDGE_STATE(2048),
111        IS_FILL_STATE(4096),
112        IS_ESTIMATE_STATE(8192),
113        CARTRIDGE_IS_INSTALLED(16384),
114        CAN_SNOOZE(32768),
115        ;
116
117        private final long mask;
118        PumpingState(long mask) {
119            this.mask = mask;
120        }
121        public long mask() {
122            return mask;
123        }
124        public static Set<PumpingState> fromBitmask(long bitmask) {
125            Set<PumpingState> ret = new TreeSet<>();
126            for (PumpingState s : values()) {
127                if ((bitmask & s.mask()) != 0) {
128                    ret.add(s);
129                }
130            }
131            return ret;
132        }
133        public static int toBitmask(PumpingState...states) {
134            int bitmask = 0;
135            for (PumpingState s : states) {
136                bitmask |= s.mask();
137            }
138            return bitmask;
139        }
140    }
141}
